channel.title: Project Circus on Purple Planetarium
channel.description: Recent content in Project Circus on Purple Planetarium

item.title: Nom bust
item.description:
First character portrait from Project Circus featuring Nom, the youngest member of the crew!

She has the unsettling habit of always munching on her fingers, despite the collective efforts of the other members to make her stop. But if she finds herself unable to remove the bandages on her hands, Nom won’t hesitate to search for another collection of soft fingers to feast onâ€¦
